implicatedStateService.Direction Générale de la Protection Civi: Direction Générale de la Protection Civile

tooltips.totalBudgetRemaining: The total remaining budget in the program or project. Is automatically calculated by subtracting the budget spent from the total budget. Not editable.
tooltips.name: Name of the project. Mandatory field.
tooltips.description: Description of the project. Maximum of 1,000 characters.
tooltips.sector: The sector(s) covered by the project. Can be more than one. Mandatory field. If a sector is not available in the list, a custom sector can be written and added to the list.
tooltips.status: The status of the project. Mandatory field.
tooltips.totalBudget: The total budget for the activity. Mandatory field.
tooltips.totalBudgetSpent: The budget spent until today on the activity. Mandatory field.
tooltips.currency: La devise utilisée pour le budget de ce projet ou programme.
tooltips.startDate: The start date of the program or project. Mandatory field.
tooltips.endDate: The end date of the project or program. Mandatory field.
tooltips.communeses: The commune(s) in which the activity is implemented. You can select more than one commune. Mandatory field.
tooltips.regions: The region(s) in which the program or project is implemented. Is automatically filled in once the commune is selected.
tooltips.cercleses: The cercle(s) in which the program or project is implemented. Is automatically filled in once the commune is selected.
tooltips.fundingSource: The funding source of the program or project. Can be more than one funding source. Mandatory field.
tooltips.branch: The branch(es) implementing the program or project. Mandatory field.
tooltips.users: The staff and volunteers of the Mali Red Cross involved in this project or program.
tooltips.assignedUser: The Mali Red Cross staff that manages the program or project. Mandatory field.
